content:
if frameType != PGFrameStyle.TNone and \
               frameType != PGFrameStyle.TFlat:
                bw = self['borderWidth']
            else:
                bw = (0, 0)

        # Set frame to new dimensions
        self.guiItem.setFrame(
            self.bounds[0] - bw[0],
            self.bounds[1] + bw[0],
            self.bounds[2] - bw[1],
            self.bounds[3] + bw[1])
